post.body: I want to see a group of people dance about architecture. It'd either look like a musical or an of out-of-place tribal ritual.
aw, hope you feel better.
snowing hard there? we're starting to get a little here.
yay, one down!
I think I'll wait till tomorrow b/c our walmart is weird late at night, but I won a giftcard @ the bob e's party i can use :)
sweet! i shall own it. (if they don't run out before i can get to it lol)
sounds awesome. do you know how much it's going for? i need to be less poor lol
OMGOMG! Where did you get the shiny edition? walmart?
SOOOO EXCITED for that movie coming out on dvd - is it out today or next week? I'm so out of the loop
I didn't want to go to work either. hopefully school is alright for ya today :)
thanks for letting me know; must be my net connection
@caseylynnm - if either of you are online right now, could you try going to LJ to see if it works for you? it's all blank for me
they were butter drop cookies (my favorite type). I didn't make them in shapes though. Other than "circular blobs" lol
it was: i wish i could see wtf is on ur head, but right now my computer is doing an epic download so I should probably wait, lol

I successfully made my first batch of from-scratch cookies ever, and they are tasty! :)
chillin'. literally.
Just took the AltNation music director survey. If they still played all these songs, maybe they'd be better again?
Happy New Year! Cheers!
Every time I see the phrase "an historic" I want to slap someone. Is "h" a vowel to you? Do you pronounce it "istoric?" No? Then say A.
had a wonderful Christmas. :)
SURS was cancelled without warning. I no longer have any reason to want FUSE.
woo pizza
J.D. and I are going to spend the night in Corbin because we can't get back to Lex tonight.
so sleepy. Smallwood Christmas at noon, though, so that's exciting.
